title: Update Supplier Contact Information
description: A supplier has notified the company of a new primary contact for handling purchase orders.

tasks.description: Locate the supplier's profile in the SRM system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully retrieves the correct supplier profile.

tasks.description: Navigate to the contacts section and add the new contact's details (name, email, phone).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enters the new contact information accurately.

tasks.description: Set the new contact as the 'Primary' for purchase orders and archive the old contact.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the contact roles.
